metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4863 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Heap buffer overflow in libwebp in Google Chrome prior to 116.0.5845.187and libwebp 1.3.2 allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of boundsmemory write via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity:Critical)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libwebp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
